üì¢ Update: Stylish Action HUD v1.5.3

üõ† Bug Fixes (v1.5.3)
* **Restored sidebar settings button**: Restored the missing button to access the Stylish Action HUD configuration from the sidebar settings menu.

‚ú® New Features (v1.5.2)
* **Split configuration permissions**: Added separate role thresholds for editing Tracking, Style/Layout, and Menu settings.
* **Auto-populate Party HUD**: Automatically selects existing Player Characters for the Party HUD on new installs.
* **Auto-add new PCs**: New PCs or actors gaining player ownership are now automatically added to the HUD.
* **Default tracking seeding**: Automatically seeds default tracking attributes (like HP) and status effects suitable for the game system.

üõ† Bug Fixes (v1.5.2)
* **Fixed Layout Drift**: Resolved issue where HUD positions would drift or jump on screens with different aspect ratios.
* **Sidebar Collision**: The HUD now respects sidebar boundaries and clamps its position to prevent overlapping.
* **Screen Size Consistency**: Fixed position shift issues when moving between ultrawide and smaller monitors.
* **Edit Mode Snapping**: Fixed containers incorrectly snapping to top-left when entering Layout Edit Mode.
* **Flicker-Free Turns**: Turn changes no longer trigger a full DOM re-render, eliminating visual flicker.
* **Actor Reset**: The Reset button now properly clears all actor-level flags and overrides.

--- 

üéÅ Earlier in v1.5.0
* **Dynamic Portraits**: Character portraits can now react to Status Effects (Poisoned, Prone, Dead, etc.).
* **Font Customization**: Customize Header and Body fonts independently with live previews.
* **Macro Description Editing**: Right-click any macro in the Action Menu to customize its tooltip flavor text.
* **Per-Actor Card Scale**: Adjust individual character card sizes (e.g., 0.6x for familiars).
* **PF2e Enhancements**: Dynamically tracks all available movement speeds for Pathfinder 2e actors.
* **Searchable Attributes**: The attribute selection dropdown is now fully searchable and sorted.

announcement.content: Restored the missing sidebar settings button. Includes v1.5.2 automation and v1.5.0 dynamic portrait features!
